means: 包上或镀上钢（steel的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: He steeled his heart against the sufferings of the poor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他硬起心肠对穷人们的苦痛不表同情.

sentence.Network_en: He steeled himself against the blow that he could see coming.
sentence.Network_cn: 他准备咬紧牙关来面临即将到来的打击.

sentence.Network_en: He steeled himself for the blow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他使自己坚强起来,经得起打击.

PerfectNetExp.abs: she had steeled herself for the Olympics in entire life .整个一生，她已做好思想准备来参加奥运会。
well - steeled ; long - tested., 久经锻炼.
The soldiers steeled themselves to withstand the attack ., 士兵他下定决心顶住进攻.

list.abs: 机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... cast iron 铸铁 cast steel 铸钢 die material 模具材料.
建筑学常见英语词汇 ... 冷压 cold-pressed 合金钢 alloy steel 钛合金 titanium alloy.
“workshop”是什么意思？-天涯问答 ... 工场安全 workshop safety ... 工具钢 tool steel 工场 workshop.
冶金英语 - 豆丁网 ... 耐热钢 heat-resisting steel 弹簧钢 spring steel 易切削钢 free-machining s teel.

entry.def: Steel is a very strong metal which is made mainly from iron. Steel is used for making many things, for example bridges, buildings, vehicles, and cutlery.
Steel is used to refer to the industry that produces steel and items made of steel.

example.tran: 对欧洲钢铁工业为期 3 个月的考察研究

example.ex: The company has interests in steel and other products.
example.tran: 公司在钢铁和其他产品领域都有投资。

entry.def: If you steel yourself, you prepare to deal with something unpleasant.

example.ex: Those involved are steeling themselves for the coming battle...
example.tran: 那些参与者正准备迎接即将到来的战斗。

example.ex: I was steeling myself to call round when Simon arrived.
example.tran: 我正下决心准备去拜访时，西蒙来了。

auth_sentence.content: He was dangerously near to converting me to righteousness but...I steeled my heart.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was dangerously near to converting me to righteousness but...I steeled my heart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was dangerously near to converting me to righteousness but...I steeled my heart.

auth_sentence.content: It's a fight that has steeled her, forged her in the purifying fires of disappointments and false promises.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a fight that has steeled her, forged her in the purifying fires of disappointments and false promises.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a fight that has steeled her, forged her in the purifying fires of disappointments and false promises.

auth_sentence.content: Sheltered domestic markets, steeled by high regulatory walls, once led to world-beating spreads and profits.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sheltered domestic markets, steeled by high regulatory walls, once led to world-beating spreads and profits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sheltered domestic markets, steeled by high regulatory walls, once led to world-beating spreads and profits.
